title: Ancient humans were hunting, eating sharks 7K years ago, burial site shows
description: Archaeologists have worked at the site since 2020, navigating an arid climate that has preserved very few organic remains.

title: France bets on nuclear power to phase out fossil fuels
description: France's government on Thursday presented an energy plan to use less imported fossil fuels, including by ramping up nuclear-fueled power production over the next decade.

title: Step inside ancient China at this immersive VR experience in Metro Vancouver
description: “Terracotta Warriors: Secrets of the First Emperor’s Mausoleum” brings one of the world’s most famous heritage sites to life through groundbreaking virtual reality at We Are VR in Lansdowne Centre
